## Meeting Overview

This document presents results from re-running Figures 1 and 2 with sample restrictions to states that are either (i) never treated, or (ii) ever-treated and have 10 or more counties meeting the balance criteria.

### Task Description

> Let's try re-running the Fig 1 and Fig 2's (3 versions each: pre_q; pre_q + inc_q; pre_q + inc_q*reform_types), with the sample limited to states that are (i) never treated or (ii) ever-treated and have 10 or more counties meeting the balance criteria.
